questions.question: In the movie “The Iron Giant,” this character is the protagonist.
When was the movie 'Con Air' released?
Which retired American football quarterback played himself in 'Ace Ventura: Pet Detective' and 'Little Nicky'?
What is the name of the robot in the 1951 science fiction film classic 'The Day the Earth Stood Still'?
Which of the following James Bond villains is not affiliated with the SPECTRE organization?
Who directed the 1973 film "American Graffiti"?
The Xenomorph from the science fiction film "Alien" has acidic blood.
In the 1979 British film "Quadrophenia" what is the name of the main protagonist?
Samuel L. Jackson had the words, 'Bad Motherf*cker' in-scripted on his lightsaber during the filming of Star Wars.
Darth Vader's famous reveal to Luke is iconic. But which of these is the right one?
incorrect_answers: "The truth is that I am your father."

questions.question: This trope refers to minor characters that are killed off to show how a monster works.

What city did the monster attack in the film, "Cloverfield"?

In the "Jurassic Park" universe, when did "Jurassic Park: San Diego" begin construction?

Which of the following films was directed by Ivan Reitman, written by Gary Ross, featured Kevin Kline, and was released in 1993?
In Big Hero 6, what were Baymax's motions modeled after?
Which 90's comedy cult classic features cameos appearances from Meat Loaf, Alice Cooper and Chris Farley?
incorrect_answers: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery

questions.question: Which star actor was in "Top Gun", "Jerry Maguire" and "Born on the Fourth of July"?
